name: NightmareBullet
description: "Nightmare Bullet" is a top-down shooting game. You control a hero trapped in a world where nightmares have come true. Where's the escape? Various enemies stand in the way of the hero. Defeat them with the hero's gun and bombs! Use different firing patterns and other techniques to handle traps and obstacles in your path.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/ Processor: 2GHz以上 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card Storage: 300 MB available space
